document_data.caption: A map showing Yhaunn on Yhauntan Bay.
document_data.name: Yhauntan Bay
document_data.region: The [[Dragon Reach]], the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Yhauntan Bay''', was a natural bay found on the [[Dragon Reach]] on the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].

Geography.Flora & Fauna: The bay had a high density of [[fish]], being a frequently fished area.<ref> It was also host to a large forest of [[kelp]], comparatively larger than that found beneath the [[Ravens Bluff Harbor]].<ref>{{Cite organized play/LC/And the Deep Blue Sea|10}}

document_data.Inhabitants: The [[Lurker in the Shallows]] was a mysterious creatures that dwelled beneath the waters of Yhauntan Bay.
